entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
